page.title: 01Introduction to our area
page.content: Our area is a very beautiful and remote part of South West Cumbria.It is a rural community depending mainly on sheep farming and forestry, implemented by tourism.Many of the houses are used for holiday purposes only. Every year there are an increasing number of visitors to rock climb or fell walk or day trippers and naturalists attracted by the scenic beauty of the wild rugged fells and the unpolluted river flowing through high crags and gorges with deep swimming pools.It is of great importance to preserve and protect the natural beauty and to appreciate the heritage.
